event.title: 2005, portions of the Village of Corrales were located

data.event: Until 2005, portions of the Village of Corrales were located in both Bernalillo and Sandoval counties.
In 2005, a special election annexed the portion of Corrales located in Bernalillo County to Sandoval County, so that now the entire village is located in Sandoval County.

event.title: located in Bernalillo County to Sandoval County, so that now

data.event: In 2005, a special election annexed the portion of Corrales located in Bernalillo County to Sandoval County, so that now the entire village is located in Sandoval County.
